definition: the Dalai Lama/abbr. of 達賴喇嘛|达赖喇嘛[Da2 lai4 La3 ma5]
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on

sentences.english: Chinese crackdown led the Dalai Lama to flee into exile in India in 1959.
sentences.chinese: 中国的打击使达赖在1959年流窜到了印度。

sentences.english: The Dalai Lama accepts his honourary Canadian citizenship in Vancouver.
sentences.chinese: 达赖喇嘛接受这一荣誉的加拿大公民在温哥华。

sentences.english: His Holiness visiting Thubten Shedrup Ling Monastery in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 达赖喇嘛在澳洲的图登些珠林寺。

sentences.english: China, which rejects Tibetan aspirations for autonomy, opposes such high-level contacts with the Dalai Lama.
sentences.chinese: 中国反对美国总统与达赖喇嘛举行高级别的会谈。

sentences.english: What action would you like to see from the Dalai Lama that would show sincerity?
sentences.chinese: 你希望看到达赖喇嘛采取什么行动来表示真诚？

sentences.english: He urged the Chinese government to hold talks with the Dalai Lama or his representatives.
sentences.chinese: 他强烈要求中国政府与达赖喇嘛或是其代表展开会谈。
达赖一贯靠说谎过日子。

sentences.english: Therefore, in the name of religion protection, Dalai Lama instigated serfs to rebel CPC .
sentences.chinese: 达赖就以保教的名义煽动那些农奴反对中共。

sentences.english: An interregnum could prove perilous for the next Dalai Lama as well.
sentences.chinese: 下任达赖喇嘛位置的空缺也能够被证明是危险的。

sentences.english: We believe that the visit further exposes the anti-China and separatist nature of the Dalai Clique.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为，这进一步暴露了达赖集团反华分裂的本质。

sentences.english: China must stop demonizing the Dalai Lama.
sentences.chinese: 中国因当停止对达赖喇嘛的妖魔化。

sentences.english: The fact is Dalai Lama is a slaveholder.
sentences.chinese: 事实是达赖喇嘛本身就是一个奴隶主。

sentences.english: I have noted that some foreign media and websites have broadcasted the video produced by the Dalai clique.
sentences.chinese: 我注意到有的外国媒体和网站播放了达赖集团的视频。

sentences.english: And we continue to encourage direct dialogue between the Chinese Government and the Dalai Lama.
sentences.chinese: 我们继续鼓励中国政府与达赖喇嘛直接对话。

sentences.english: Dharamshala serves as the Dalai Lama's base.
sentences.chinese: Dharamshala被视为达赖喇嘛的基地。

sentences.english: We think that has further exposed the anti-China and separatist nature of the Dalai clique.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为，这进一步暴露了达赖集团反华分裂的本质。

definition: Panchen (Lama)/abbr. for 班禪額爾德尼|班禅额尔德尼[Ban1 chan2 E2 er3 de2 ni2]
Panchen Erdeni or Panchen Lama/abbr. to 班禪|班禅[Ban1 chan2]
pinyin: Ban1 chan2 E2 er3 de2 ni2

definition: Living Buddha/title of Mongolian Lamas from 17th century
lama, spiritual teacher in Tibetan Buddhism
Yellow hat or Gelugpa school of Tibetan Buddhism/also written 格魯派|格鲁派[Ge2 lu3 pai4]
Dharamsala in Himachal Pradesh, north India, home of Tibetan government in exile
Tsongkhapa (1357-1419), Tibetan religious leader, founder of the Gelugpa school 格魯派|格鲁派[Ge2 lu3 pai4]
